problems.title: GCD Recursively
problems.description:
Write a recursive function to find the Greatest Common Divisor (GCD) of two numbers using the Euclidean algorithm.

Input Format:
Two space-separated integers A and B.

Output Format:
Print the GCD of A and B.
problems.examples:
Sample Input
48 18

Sample Output
6

Sample Input
10 5

Sample Output
5
hintsList: Think about the base case and the recursive step.
